author: Kelsey Stiegman
title: 30 Cute Prom Sneakers – Best Stylish Sneakers For Prom 2024
text:
Design by Yoora Kim Seventeen picks products that we think you'll love the most. We may earn commission from the links on this page.
On prom night you want to look like your regular self, but elevated . Because there's literally no point in spending hours getting all dressed up if at the end of it all, you feel uncomfortable with your own look. And if the real you wears sneakers almost every single day, you should skip the toe-pinching pumps and opt for cool sneaks on prom night, too.
We fully support your comfy-footed prom endeavors. The hard part is, finding a pair that still feels dressy enough for a ball gown type of evening. The secret is to shop options you already love, but with prom-y details. Do you live in Air Force 1s ? Go for a sleek metallic pair. Vans are your go-to? Slip into a tie-dye version. Plain white sneakers are your signature? Try a glitter option. All of those and more are right ahead for your shopping pleasure.
Our Top Picks

Kelsey Stiegman Senior Style Editor Kelsey is Seventeen.com's fashion expert and resident Harry Potter nerd. At the office, she spends her day writing about style, beauty, and literally every move Kylie Jenner makes. On the weekends, you can find her sifting through vintage shops and hunting for the perfect burger. Follow her on Instagram at @klstieg.
Briannah Rivera Editorial and Social Media Assistant Bri is the editorial and social media assistant at ELLE.com. Before joining the team at ELLE, she worked as the editorial assistant for Seventeen.com and Cosmopolitan.com where she covered all things celebrity news and pop culture. You can probably find her sipping an oatmilk iced chai while searching for the best new makeup products or thrifting her entire wardrobe.

author: Efe
title: ALERTA VIENTOS | Santa Cruz de Tenerife suspende las actividades municipales al aire libre por vientos
text:
El Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz de Tenerife ha informado este viernes de que ha procedido a la activación del Plan Municipal de Emergencias (PEMU) y suspende las actividades al aire libre organizadas por el consistorio, ante la declaración de alerta por vientos decretada por la Dirección General de Emergencias del Gobierno de Canarias , a partir de las 00.00 horas del 14 de diciembre de 2024.
En cuanto a la activación del PEMU, tal y como se recoge en el decreto firmado por la concejala de Seguridad, Gladis de León , la suspensión de actividades se aplicará a partir de las 00.00 horas, de forma que, a partir de entonces, quedarán aplazadas todas las actividades al aire libre organizadas por el Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz, así como el cierre de las instalaciones municipales al aire libre que conlleven la afluencia de público, como polideportivos, piscinas municipales, canchas deportivas y cualquier otra de ocio y esparcimiento.
El Ayuntamiento ha detallado en un comunicado que esta situación se mantendrá mientras esté vigente la alerta por vientos decretada por el Gobierno de Canarias , por lo que se aconseja seguir las recomendaciones propias de este tipo de riesgo y que en términos generales pasan por evitar los desplazamientos innecesarios, y prestar atención a las recomendaciones de las autoridades al respecto, así como el mantenerse informado a través de fuentes oficiales y de los medios de comunicación.
Se recomienda asegurar puertas, ventanas y toldos para evitar corrientes de aire que puedan llevar a la rotura y caída de cristales. También retirar de ventanas, balcones y azoteas las macetas y todos los objetos que puedan caer a la calle y provocar un accidente.
Además, se deben revisar las viviendas para que no haya cornisas, balcones o fachadas en mal estado que puedan producir caídas de cascotes y escombros.
Según la alerta declarada por la Dirección General de Emergencias del Gobierno de Canarias, se prevé viento general del sur y sureste moderado con intervalos fuertes en la costa y fuerte en medianías, zonas altas y cumbres.
Se espera probables rachas muy fuertes que alcanzarán y superarán los 80-90 km/h, y localmente los 100 km/h en la vertiente norte y oeste, en las zonas altas y cumbres de las islas en situación de alerta.
El Ayuntamiento realiza un llamamiento a la ciudadanía para actuar con responsabilidad y evitar, lo máximo posible, ponerse en situación de riesgo.

organizations.name: Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz de Tenerife

author: David Griffin
title: Oklahoma Boat Expo Happening At Cox Business Convention Center
text: Friday, January 5th 2024, 3:28 pm For those looking for an escape from the cold, the Oklahoma Boat Expo is in Tulsa this weekend. With more than 200 lakes, Oklahoma is a lake lover's paradise. "Everybody knows around Tulsa there are lakes everywhere and so the show has really been embraced by Tulsa and beyond Tulsa," said show coordinator Don Miner. Find More Stories Like This On The [Arca Continental Coca-Cola Southwest Beverages Porch](https://www.newson6.com/porch) The Oklahoma Boat Expo is at the Cox Business Convention Center on Friday from 11 a.m. to 8 p.m., Saturday from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m., and Sunday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. "The boats that you are going to see, it is a wide array of boats that we have out here," Miner said. "You will have entry-level boats that will start out as low as $20,000 and then you have boats that will go all the way up to how much money do you want to spend today." Since it is the off-season for boating, show coordinator Don Miner said discounts are as much as 30% to 40% off. "You are going to get to see deals here in January that you will not see for the rest of the year," he added. In its third year in Tulsa, the Oklahoma Boat Expo has more boat dealers than ever before with 18 different ones from all over Oklahoma in attendance. "Hands down this is the biggest boat show in Oklahoma, period," Miner continued saying, "There are more boat dealers here this weekend than there will be at any other show in Oklahoma this year." While the boats are the main attraction there is also something for the outdoorsman. Miner said, "There is personal watercraft, there is side by sides, there is motorcycles, there is kayaks, and everything for the outdoors here." Making this weekend the perfect opportunity to buy before it warms up and the prices shoot up. Tickets for the Oklahoma Boat Expo are $12 at the door and free for children 12 and under. QuikTrip locations in the Tulsa metro also have a coupon for $2 off. Miner said, "You buy a ticket for our show, and you can come back all three days, the ticket is good for the entire show." January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024 January 5th, 2024

author: www.mrsadiq.info | Sadiq Məmmədov
title: Türkiye nabs 32 suspected terrorists over plotting attacks on religious sites, Iraqi Embassy
text: Türkiye nabs 32 suspected terrorists over plotting attacks on religious sites, Iraqi Embassy Turkish security forces nabbed 32 suspects, including three senior members of the Daesh/ISIS terror group, who were plotting to attack synagogues, churches, and the Iraqi Embassy in Türkiye, security officials said Friday, [News.Az](https://news.az/News.Az) reports citing Anadolu Agency. The Turkish National Intelligence Organization (MIT) identified the senior members of the terror group as Mejbel Al-Shweihi, codenamed Abou Yakeen Al-Iraqi, and Mohammad Khallaf Ibrahim, codenamed Abou Laith, who were planning attacks on synagogues and churches in Türkiye. Also, Ihab Elaani, codenamed Abdullah Al-Jumaili, was plotting a terror attack on the Iraqi Embassy in Türkiye. In a coordinated operation conducted at dawn by MIT and Turkish police in nine different cities, the senior terrorists and 29 other individuals linked with them were apprehended. The operation resulted in the seizure of numerous digital materials belonging to the terror group. In 2013, Türkiye became one of the first countries to declare Daesh/ISIS a terrorist organization. The country has since been attacked by the terror group multiple times, with over 300 people killed and hundreds more injured in at least 10 suicide bombings, seven bomb attacks, and four armed attacks. In response, Türkiye launched anti-terror operations at home and abroad to prevent further attacks.
